name: Stacy & Mari Dress Up (GeekRemix Fan Game)
name_original: Stacy & Mari Dress Up (GeekRemix Fan Game)
description:
A Geek Remix fan game, inspired by their Let's Plays of girly flash games online.

Written with JavaScript and HTML5, and it's open source! You can find the source code here: https://github.com/RachelJMorris/Stacy-and-Mari-Dressup
